descriptionHTML:
Turn your smart watch into an awesome on wrist ZOO. Trigger different animal sounds with the help of your Android Wear<\b> Smartwatch.

Be the roar master and create funny jokes and hilarious situations at your will. Just press discreetly on an animal icon on your Android Wear smartwatch and be amazed.

Make sure you turn up your Media Volume to hear the funny voices in all their glory.

One of the funniest Android Wear apps for you to enjoy on your smart watch.

Included:

★ Easy installation on your Android Wear watch
★ 9 Different animal voices that can be triggered remotely from your wrist.
★ 1 Free Goat voice. You can get others through in-app purchases in Animal Sounds Market.
★ Great fun for you or your kids
comments: Poor and costly The app interface is nothing like the screenshots. Only cat meow is free, all other noises bring up a message "Please buy this fart!".
Must pay for every animal.  A joke
